import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' export default function Navbar(props) { return (
{props.title}
  • Home
  • {props.abouttext}
{/* switch */}
) } Navbar.propTypes= { title : PropTypes.string, abouttext: PropTypes.string } Navbar.defaultProps = { title: "TextUtils", abouttext: "About Us" }
